text: Nand Kumar Singh Chauhan (8 September 1952 â€“ 2 March 2021) was an Indian politician. He was born in Burhanpur, Madhya Pradesh. He was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party.He had three children named Pratiksha Chauhan,Vedanti Chauhan,and Harshvardhan Singh. Nandakumar Singh Chauhan was a member of the Lok Sabha from 1996 until 2009 and again from 2014 until his death. Chauhan died on 2 March 2021 at a New Delhi hospital from COVID-19, aged 68.BJP MP Nand Kumar Singh Chauhan passes away ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Madhya Pradesh Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in New Delhi Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Nandkumar Singh Chauhan
